item.title: Stride
item.description:
Easy engineering calculations
Stride is a more modern technical documentation + calculation software for engineers and other calculation-driven professionals. It is local-first, has a robust units system, and is markdown-based.

item.title: Talespinner
item.description:
AI assisted story writing with complete control
Talespinner.io empowers storytellers with AI assistance. Craft characters, plots, and chapters using advanced language models. Generate ideas, and write your novel in any genre. Choose from multiple AI models with unique strengths. Write in any language.

item.title: Reimbursable
item.description:
Effortless HSA reimbursement tracking
Build wealth through health with effortless HSA reimbursement tracking. Reimbursable helps you find and track qualified medical expenses for future reimbursement.

item.title: AiQArt by LockChain
item.description:
Generate AI art QR codes
Ultra quality, photorealistic QR codes. Perks: No watermark. No subscription. Cheap credit-based generations. Free credits for new users. Buy as much as you want. No URL shortener - use your own. All features unlocked. No extra fees.

item.title: Writers Copilot
item.description:
Transform your writing with smart, instant edits
It is a writing assistant that streamlines editing by providing targeted feedback and previewing suggested changes. Users can hover over revisions to see how they'll look and engage in threaded side conversations for focused discussions on specific sections.

item.title: LockBridge
item.description:
Secure and seamless file transfer with zero-trust encryption
A secure, file-sharing platform for businesses that prioritize data protection. It enables real-time file transfers with peer-to-peer and end to end encrypted storage. With role-based access control, admins can manage permissions across different user roles

item.title: Invoice Matchpoint by .dodocs.AI
item.description:
80/20 - focus on added value tasks, keep the rest for dodocs
.dodocs Invoice MatchPoint API designed to automate invoices, quotations and receipts processing for accounting and restaurants inventory management of any type of business. The product already proved and saves up to 90% time of operations with documents

item.title: Backlink Status Checker
item.description:
One-Click Backlink Status Check â€“ Fast and Easy
The Backlink Status Checker is a simple yet powerful tool for SEOs and site owners. With one click, you can check if your backlinks are live, broken, or missing and see whether theyâ€™re do-follow or no-follow, giving you quick insights about your backlinks.

item.title: sphere
item.description:
AI-powered knowledge management platform for colleges.
This platform helps students and teachers to store notes on the cloud or create new ones with a built-in text editor. It offers a centralized repository for accessing notes and question papers plus a productivity suite for efficient time management.

item.title: WbizTool - Personal Whatsapp API
item.description:
Automate your whatsapp messages
Wbiztool lets you convert your WhatsApp into a powerful messaging API. Automate communication via API or Excel integration for seamless business interactions.

item.title: Doc Insight
item.description:
Empower ChatGPT: Enhanced Doc Q&A and Academic Reading
Unlock the full potential of ChatGPT for document analysis, the ultimate extension for researchers, students, and professionals. Features: ğŸ’ Instant Document Preview ğŸ’ Auto-Generated Table of Contents ğŸ’ Diagram Rendering ğŸ’ Smart Prompts for Deeper Engagement

item.title: X Bot Remover
item.description:
Remove suspected bots from your X account.
A rule-based automation tool to remove suspected bots from your X account.

item.title: Color Explorer
item.description:
Tap into unlimited inspiration!
Fuel your creative spark with Color Explorer. Dive into 100s of color-coded ads, artworks, palettes, and bring your vision to life with our (actually) fully customizable templates.
